Package index

All functions

get_gg_info()
Find build information of a ggplot
ggvar_acf() ggvar_ccf()
Plot autocorrelation and similar
ggvar_dispersion()
Plot VAR residuals dispersion
ggvar_distribution()
Plot VAR residuals distribution
ggvar_fevd()
Plot VAR forecast error variance decomposition
ggvar_fit()
Plot VAR fitted values
ggvar_history()
Plot historic values of dataset or VAR residuals
ggvar_irf()
Plot VAR impulse response functions
ggvar_predict()
Plot VAR predictions
ggvar_select()
Plot VAR information criteria for lag selection
ggvar_stability()
Plot VAR structural stability
